title: Game Progress Route
content:
e them in with pride. Refugees aren't strays. They are people, and they need help. [Baldurian] I'll have you know I was born and bred in Baldur's Gate. [Baldurian] Baldurian? Your accent's Rivingtonian - that hardly counts. I should be leaving.

Choose the fourth option, and Saer will be offended. At X:102 Y:-111, you'll encounter Rowan, a guard, who greets you and inquires if this is your first visit to Baldur's Gate. You can respond in the following ways:

[Baldurian] No, I'm from Baldur's Gat
